discussion.author: ViralBShah
discussion.text:
I am not quite sure if the failure is only due to the name being too short (which I think in this case is fine), or is it something else.

@ChrisRackauckas ?

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text: Also the version number not being any of X.0.0, 0.1.0 or 0.0.1

discussion.author: ViralBShah
discussion.text: Will that break something, if we merge it with the version number it has? Clearly the package has earlier history prior to registration - so I'd be ok merging - all else being ok.

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text: No, it's just one of the guidelines for automatic merging, but it doesn't cause any harm
